description:
✔ CHALLENGING PUZZLE THAT MAKE YOU THINK 

Do you like puzzle games which will push your brain thinking skills to the extent? If yes then "Paint The Block" is perfect puzzling game for you! You need to color square block to match the colors as the level demands. 

✔ USE COLORS IN THE RIGHT WAY

"Paint The Block – Brain Challenge Strategic Puzzle" is one of the coolest, greatest and brain challenging puzzle games you can enjoy on your phone FREE right now. With its unique logic and mind challenge it will definitely test your problem solving skills and improve them. The main objective of this logic puzzle game is to look the given square Block paint pattern and create the same with the help of provided 6 different colors and different covers, You can apply different colors and covers will help you to hide specific section which you do not want to paint with new color. 

✔ PROGRESSIVELY CHALLENGING AND HARD

At the beginning solving puzzles will be the peace of cake, But as you progress this addictive game will get harder and will challenge you -- You will end up scratching your head and with try and try again can solve puzzles. Though its hard to complete you will love it! Show great strategy, fast thinking, logical thinking to solve the level. Train your brain to focus, concentrate and think in a different way with fun playing for hours. You will not feel bored even if you play it for many hours. When you are waiting for someone, when you are travelling, when you need some break play this fun and addictive free "Paint the block – Brain Challenge Strategic Puzzle" game. Your brain needs challenges too to become more smarter ♛.
